street.title: The street schema
street.description: The street the customer lives on.

city.title: The city schema
city.description: The city the customer lives in.

customerType.title: The customerType schema
customerType.description: What kind of customer is this: B2B or B2C?

market.title: The market schema
market.description: Which market is the customer part of?

products.title: The products schema
products.description: String of product SKUs that the customer will purchase.

totalPrice.title: The totalPrice schema
totalPrice.description: Total cost in USD cents of products.

testId.title: The testId schema
testId.description: The unique test ID. Will be 0 if not part of a test.

orgNumber.title: The orgNumber schema
orgNumber.description: The unique organization number for a B2B customer. Will be 0 if sent by a B2C customer.
